articles.author: Isabel Reynolds
articles.title: US Commander Warns China Is Fast Becoming More Aggressive in Region - Bloomberg
articles.description: China is rapidly becoming more aggressive in its rhetoric and actions across Asia, the outgoing head of the US Indo-Pacific Command said, as Beijing turned up the heat on Washington just before Secretary of State Tony Blinken heads to the country for a high-s…
